style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">Full-Year</font></div><div style="margin-top:9pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">The estimated total market in the Middle East &#38; Africa decreased by 0.8% to 557.2 billion units, mainly due to&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Algeria, down by 16.1%, or by 6.8% excluding the net unfavorable impact of estimated trade inventory movements, primarily reflecting industry supply chain disruptions, as well as the impact of excise tax-driven price increases in the first quarter of 2021&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Turkey, down by 6.3%, mainly reflecting a higher estimated prevalence of illicit trade, partly offset by the impact on adult smoker average daily consumption of the easing of pandemic-related measures, coupled with increased in-bound tourism&#59;</font></div><div style="height:40.5pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">- 21 -</font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:40.5pt;width:100%"><div style="margin-top:3pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">partly offset by</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">International Duty Free, up by 43.8%, primarily reflecting the impact of reduced government travel restrictions and increased passenger traffic in certain geographies.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's Regional market share increased by 1.6 points to 24.7%.</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's total shipment volume increased by 6.5% to 138.6 billion units, mainly driven by&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Egypt, up by 8.2%, primarily reflecting a higher market share driven by cigarettes and HTUs&#59; and </font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">PMI Duty Free, up by 61.3%, or by 47.3% excluding the net favorable impact of estimated distributor inventory movements (primarily due to cigarettes), reflecting the higher total market and a higher market share.</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">Fourth-Quarter</font></div><div style="margin-top:9pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">The estimated total market in the Middle East &#38; Africa decreased, mainly due to&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Algeria, down by 26.5%, or by 8.8% excluding the net unfavorable impact of estimated trade inventory movements, primarily reflecting industry supply chain disruptions&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Turkey, down by 6.8%, mainly reflecting a higher estimated prevalence of illicit trade, partly offset by the impact of increased in-bound tourism&#59;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">partly offset by</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Egypt, up by 6.6%, primarily reflecting calendar factors and the impact on adult smoker average daily consumption of the easing of pandemic-related measures, partly offset by a higher estimated prevalence of illicit trade and the impact of price increases in the first half of 2022&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">International Duty Free, up by 47.4%, mainly reflecting the same factors as for the year.</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's total shipment volume increased by 4.9% to 37.1 billion units, mainly driven by&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Egypt, up by 23.5%, or by 13.6% excluding the net favorable impact of estimated distributor inventory movements, reflecting the higher total market and a higher market share.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="margin-top:13pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Net revenues increased by 6.2% on an organic basis, reflecting&#58; favorable volume&#47;mix, primarily driven by higher cigarette volume and favorable cigarette mix&#59; and a favorable pricing variance, mainly due to combustible tobacco pricing.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Operating income increased by 5.7%, excluding currency and acquisitions. Adjusted operating income increased by 4.7% on an organic basis, primarily reflecting&#58; lower marketing, administration and research costs&#59; and a favorable pricing variance&#59; partly offset by unfavorable volume&#47;mix, mainly due to lower cigarette mix. Adjusted operating income margin decreased by 0.5 points on an organic basis.</font></div><div style="height:40.5pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div basis, reflecting&#58; a favorable pricing variance, driven by combustible tobacco pricing. Volume&#47;mix was slightly unfavorable, primarily due to lower cigarette volume, largely offset by favorable cigarette mix.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Operating income increased by 27.2%, excluding currency and acquisitions. Adjusted operating income increased by 18.1% on an organic basis, primarily reflecting&#58; a favorable pricing variance&#59; and lower marketing, administration and research costs&#59; partly offset by unfavorable volume&#47;mix, mainly due to lower cigarette volume. Adjusted operating income margin increased by 2.2 points on an organic basis.</font></div><div id="if35dd73cdf9149249a054c07087a72f3_88"></div><div style="margin-top:18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%">1.6</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#160;</font></td><td style="background-color:#cceeff;border-top:1pt solid #000000;padding:2px 1pt 2px 0;text-align:right;vertical-align:bottom"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%">%</font></td></tr></table></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">Full-Year</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">The estimated total market in South &#38; Southeast Asia increased by 2.9% to 743.3 billion units, mainly driven by&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">India, up by 16.8%, primarily reflecting a favorable comparison versus the prior year, during which pandemic-related restrictions impacted the movement of certain products, including tobacco&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Indonesia, up by 4.5%, mainly reflecting the impact on adult smoker consumption of the easing of pandemic-related measures, which drove growth in the tax-advantaged 'below tier one' segment&#59;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">partly offset by</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Bangladesh, down by 4.0%, primarily reflecting the impact of pandemic-related restrictions on mobility during February 2022, as well as the impact of second-quarter 2022 excise tax-driven price increases&#59; and</font></div><div style="height:40.5pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">- 24 -</font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:40.5pt;width:100%"><div style="margin-top:3pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font><br></font></div></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">the Philippines, down by 6.1%, mainly reflecting the impact of first-quarter 2022 excise tax-driven price increases.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's Regional market share decreased by 0.3 points to 19.4%.</font></div><div style="margin-top:9pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's total shipment volume increased by 1.6% to 144.5 billion units, mainly driven by&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">India, up by 73.9%, primarily reflecting a higher market share (driven by geographic expansion) and the higher total market&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Indonesia, up by 4.8%, mainly reflecting the higher total market&#59;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">partly offset by</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">the Philippines, down by 6.3%, mainly reflecting the lower total market.</font></div><div style="margin-top:1pt;text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="margin-top:1pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">Fourth-Quarter</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">The estimated total market in South &#38; Southeast Asia decreased, mainly due to&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Indonesia, down by 5.1%, mainly reflecting the impact of inflationary pressure driven by fuel price increases&#59;</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Pakistan, down by 13.6%, primarily reflecting the impact of excise tax-driven price increases&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">the Philippines, down by 10.8%, primarily reflecting the same factor as for the year&#59;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">partly offset by</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">India, up by 14.8%, primarily reflecting the same factor as for the year.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's total shipment volume decreased by 4.1% to 34.7 billion units, mainly due to&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Indonesia, down by 3.7%, primarily reflecting the lower total market, partly offset by a higher market share (mainly driven by share growth for PMI's premium and hand-rolled portfolio, partly offset by adult smoker down-trading to the 'below tier one' segment as a result of significantly lower retail prices)&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">the Philippines, down by 11.6%, primarily reflecting the lower total market.</font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="text-align:justify"><font><br></font></div><div style="height:40.5pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">- 25 -</font></div></div></div><div id="if35dd73cdf9149249a054c07087a72f3_91"></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:40.5pt;width:100%"><div style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 style="margin-top:10pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Net revenues decreased by 3.9% on an organic basis, primarily reflecting&#58; unfavorable volume&#47;mix, mainly due to unfavorable device mix, lower cigarette volume and unfavorable cigarette mix, partly offset by higher HTU volume and higher device volume&#59; and an unfavorable pricing comparison.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Operating income decreased by 10.9%, excluding currency and acquisitions. Adjusted operating income decreased by 13.1% on an organic basis, mainly reflecting&#58; unfavorable volume&#47;mix, primarily due to unfavorable HTU mix, lower cigarette volume, unfavorable cigarette mix and unfavorable device mix&#59; and higher manufacturing costs&#59; partly offset by lower marketing, administration and research costs.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Adjusted operating income margin decreased by 4.3 points on an organic basis. The margin decline was primarily due to the impact of higher device sales&#59; the growth of </font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">ILUMA</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%"> within the Region's smoke-free product portfolio mix, with its higher initial unit cost of devices and consumables&#59; and higher logistics costs, including costs related to the use of air freight to Japan.</font></div><div style="height:40.5pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">- 26 style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%">6.4pp</font></td><td colspan="3" style="background-color:#cceeff;padding:2px 1pt;text-align:right;vertical-align:middle"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%">6.8pp</font></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="margin-top:10pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Net revenues increased by 6.0% on an organic basis, reflecting&#58; favorable volume&#47;mix, driven by higher HTU volume, partly offset by unfavorable HTU mix, unfavorable device mix (primarily due to </font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">ILUMA ONE</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">) and lower cigarette volume&#59; partly offset by an unfavorable pricing variance, mainly due to lower HTU (net) pricing and lower device pricing, partly offset by higher combustible tobacco pricing.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Operating income increased by 36.1%, excluding currency and acquisitions. Adjusted operating income increased by 25.3% on an organic basis, mainly reflecting&#58; lower marketing, administration and research costs (due to a favorable comparison versus the fourth quarter of 2021, which included higher commercial investments behind the launch of </font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">ILUMA</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">)&#59; and favorable volume&#47;mix, primarily driven by higher HTU volume, partly offset by unfavorable HTU mix and lower cigarette volume&#59; partially offset by an unfavorable pricing variance. Adjusted operating income margin increased by 6.8 points on an organic basis.</font></div><div id="if35dd73cdf9149249a054c07087a72f3_97"></div><div style="margin-top:12pt"><font style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">Full-Year</font></div><div style="margin-top:9pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">The estimated total market in East Asia &#38; Australia, excluding China, decreased by 0.9% to 292.8 billion units, mainly due to&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Japan, down by 1.5%, primarily reflecting the impact of the October 2021 excise tax-driven price increases.</font></div><div style="height:40.5pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">- 27 -</font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:40.5pt;width:100%"><div style="margin-top:3pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's Regional market share, excluding China, increased by 0.8 points to 27.3%.</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's total shipment volume decreased by 0.2% to 81.9 billion units, mainly due to&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Australia, down by 5.1%, mainly reflecting a lower total market, partly offset by a higher market share&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">South Korea, down by 1.6%, primarily reflecting a lower market share&#59;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">partly offset by</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Japan, up by 0.6%, or by 3.9% excluding the net unfavorable impact of estimated distributor inventory movements (primarily due to HTUs), reflecting a higher market share, partly offset by the lower total market.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Excluding the net unfavorable impact of estimated distributor inventory movements, PMI's total in-market sales volume increased by 1.9%.</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">Fourth-Quarter</font></div><div style="margin-top:9pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">The estimated total market in East Asia &#38; Australia, excluding China, increased, mainly driven by&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Japan, up by 11.9%, or by 1.8% excluding the net favorable impact of estimated trade inventory movements, primarily reflecting heated tobacco category growth.</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's total shipment volume increased by 11.3% to 22.4 billion units, mainly due to&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Japan, up by 17.8%, primarily reflecting the higher total market and a higher market share (driven by HTUs).</font></div><div id="if35dd73cdf9149249a054c07087a72f3_100"></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">AMERICAS REGION</font></div><div id="if35dd73cdf9149249a054c07087a72f3_103"></div><div style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Net revenues increased by 4.1% on an organic basis, primarily reflecting&#58; a favorable pricing variance, driven by combustible tobacco pricing&#59; partly offset by unfavorable volume&#47;mix, mainly due to unfavorable cigarette mix.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Operating income decreased by 8.2%, excluding currency and acquisitions. Adjusted operating income decreased by 8.5% on an organic basis, mainly reflecting&#58; higher marketing, administration and research costs&#59; and higher manufacturing costs&#59; partly offset by a favorable pricing variance. Volume&#47;mix was slightly </font></div><div style="height:40.5pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">- 28 -</font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:40.5pt;width:100%"><div style="margin-top:3pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">unfavorable, mainly due to unfavorable cigarette mix, largely offset by higher cigarette volume. Adjusted operating income margin decreased by 3.3 points on an organic basis. The margin decline was notably due to incremental investments in the U.S. market, including expenses related to domestic manufacturing.</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">Fourth-Quarter</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Net revenues increased by 2.3% on an organic basis, primarily reflecting&#58; a favorable pricing variance, driven by combustible tobacco pricing&#59; partly offset by unfavorable volume&#47;mix, mainly due to lower cigarette volume and unfavorable cigarette mix.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">Operating income decreased by 4.2%, excluding currency and acquisitions. Adjusted operating income decreased by 11.3% on an organic basis, mainly reflecting&#58; higher marketing, administration and research costs&#59; partly offset by a favorable pricing variance. Adjusted operating income margin decreased by 3.1 points on an organic basis. The margin decline was notably due to incremental investments in the U.S. market, including expenses related to domestic manufacturing.</font></div><div 2px 0;text-align:right;vertical-align:bottom"></td><td colspan="2" style="background-color:#cceeff;border-top:1pt solid #000000;padding:2px 0 2px 1pt;text-align:right;vertical-align:bottom"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%">65,163</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#160;</font></td><td style="background-color:#cceeff;border-top:1pt solid #000000;padding:2px 1pt 2px 0;text-align:right;vertical-align:bottom"></td><td colspan="2" style="background-color:#cceeff;border-top:1pt solid #000000;padding:2px 0 2px 1pt;text-align:right;vertical-align:bottom"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%">2.1</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:100%">&#160;</font></td><td style="background-color:#cceeff;border-top:1pt solid #000000;padding:2px 1pt 2px 0;text-align:right;vertical-align:bottom"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%">%</font></td></tr></table></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">Full-Year</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">The estimated total market in the Americas, excluding the U.S., increased by 1.7% to 190.8 billion units, primarily driven by&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Brazil, up by 7.6%, primarily reflecting a lower estimated prevalence of illicit trade&#59;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">partly offset by</font></div><div style="height:40.5pt;position:relative;width:100%"><div style="bottom:0;position:absolute;width:100%"><div style="text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">- 29 -</font></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div style="min-height:40.5pt;width:100%"><div style="margin-top:3pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font><br></font></div></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Canada, down by 12.8%, notably reflecting the impact of price increases and out-switching from cigarettes to e-vapor products.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's Regional market share, excluding the U.S., increased by 0.3 points to 34.8%.</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's total shipment volume increased by 2.1% to 66.5 billion units, mainly driven by&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Brazil, up by 13.3%, primarily reflecting the higher total market and a higher market share&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Mexico, up by 2.5%, mainly reflecting a higher total market and a higher market share for cigarettes&#59;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">partly offset by</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Argentina, down by 2.8%, primarily reflecting a lower market share due to adult smoker downtrading to ultra-low-price brands produced by local manufacturers, partly offset by a higher total market.</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">Fourth-Quarter</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">The estimated total market in the Americas, excluding the U.S., increased, primarily driven by&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Brazil, up by 7.6%, primarily reflecting the same factor as for the year&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Mexico, up by 2.9%, mainly reflecting the impact on adult smoker average daily consumption of the easing of pandemic-related measures&#59;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">partly offset by</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Argentina, down by 5.5%, mainly reflecting the impact of price increases and a general deterioration of the macroeconomic environment&#59; and</font></div><div style="padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Canada, down by 11.4%, notably reflecting the same factors as for the year. </font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI's total shipment volume increased by 0.1% to 18.6 billion units, mainly driven by&#58;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">&#8226;</font><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Brazil, up by 12.3%, primarily reflecting the same factors as for the year&#59;</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">partly offset by</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;padding-left:18pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-18pt"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%;padding-left:14.5pt">Argentina, down by 7.3%, primarily reflecting the lower total market.</font></div><div id="if35dd73cdf9149249a054c07087a72f3_1315"></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI recorded net revenues of $316 million in the Swedish Match segment for the full-year and fourth-quarter periods, with an operating loss of $22 million, primarily reflecting acquisition accounting-related items and the amortization of acquired intangibles.</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">PMI recorded adjusted operating income of $129 million in the segment, reflecting an adjusted operating margin of 40.8%.</font></div><div id="if35dd73cdf9149249a054c07087a72f3_109"></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:center"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">WELLNESS AND HEALTHCARE</font></div><div style="margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:400;line-height:174%">In the third quarter of 2021, PMI acquired Fertin Pharma A&#47;S, Vectura Group plc. and OtiTopic, Inc. On March 31, 2022, PMI launched a new Wellness and Healthcare business -- Vectura Fertin Pharma -- consolidating these entities. The operating results of this business are reported in the Wellness and Healthcare segment.</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:174%">Full-Year</font></div><div style="margin-top:5pt;text-align:center"><table style="background-color:#cceeff;padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="background-color:#cceeff;padding:2px 1pt;text-align:right;vertical-align:middle"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%">(57.1)pp</font></td><td colspan="3" style="background-color:#cceeff;padding:2px 1pt;text-align:right;vertical-align:middle"><font style="color:#000000;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:700;line-height:100%">(59.5)pp</font></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0 1pt"></td><td colspan="3" style="padding:0
